 Details



				David Sedaris’ sardonic wit and incisive social critiques make him one of America’s preeminent humor writers. Likened to a modern-day Mark Twain, Sedaris is noted for his ability to draw humorous, touching, and universal observations about human nature from his own, often quirky, experiences. A former National Public Radio host, he is a best-selling author with titles including Me Talk Pretty One Day, When You Are Engulfed in Flames, Let’s Explore Diabetes with Owls, and The Best of Me. His latest book is entitled Happy-Go-Lucky.
